channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Status Quo or Revolution?
item.description: The peculiar fiscal footprint of the Trump administration.

item.title: Reject the Self-Loathing: A Case for Grateful Patriotism
item.description: Let’s roll up our sleeves and get to the work of renewing this country and passing the blessings of liberty on to the next generation.

item.title: Wisconsin Move Exposes Planned Parenthood Lies
item.description: It shows government money has long supported abortion procedures there.

item.title: Don’t Tax Innovation: The Patent ‘Wealth Tax’ Is a Terrible Idea
item.description: The administration’s proposed fee based on patent value is not only bad policy; it is unconstitutional.

item.title: With More Scrutiny, the Trump DOJ Indictment of Comey Gets Worse
item.description: There is no provable false-statements case against the former FBI director.

item.title: Republicans and Democrats play the blame game ahead of a potential government shutdown
item.description: Congressional leaders are pointing fingers at each other ahead of a high-stakes meeting at the White House to avert a potential government shutdown.
